meanings.definition: The fertilization of an ovum from one individual with the sperm of another individual.
meanings.sent1: Allogamy occurs when the egg from one person meets the sperm from another person.
meanings.sent2: In nature, allogamy is essential for genetic diversity.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the allogamy of flavors in the cake surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration was like a beautiful allogamy of ideas, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The concept of allogamy can be compared to a dance where two partners come together to create something new.

meanings.definition: The process of cross-fertilization between different individuals of the same species.
meanings.sent1: Allogamy promotes genetic variation within a species.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often rely on allogamy to improve crop yields.
meanings.sent3: The allogamy of ideas in the brainstorming session led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was an allogamy of personalities, complementing each other perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The garden showcased the beauty of allogamy as different flowers cross-pollinated to create unique hybrids.
